inquiry_text: Do you offer any discounts for groups of 6 or more?
response_text: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for groups of 6 or more. Please mention your group size when booking.

inquiry_text: What is your cancellation policy?
response_text: Our standard policy allows cancellation up to 30 days before departure for a full refund, and 50% refund up to 14 days before.

inquiry_text: Can you accommodate vegetarian diets?
response_text: Yes, we cater to vegetarian diets on all our trips. Please note your dietary requirements during booking.

inquiry_text: Is the hiking tour suitable for beginners?
response_text: Yes, our Alpine Experience tour is rated as moderate and suitable for beginners with reasonable fitness levels.

inquiry_text: Do I need a visa for this destination?
response_text: Visa requirements depend on your nationality. Please check with the embassy or consulate of your destination country.

inquiry_text: Are flights included in the package?
response_text: No, our packages do not include international flights, but we can help arrange these for an additional fee.

inquiry_text: Is there Wi-Fi at the accommodations?
response_text: All our listed accommodations offer Wi-Fi in common areas, though connection speeds may vary in remote locations.

inquiry_text: Can I bring my child along?
response_text: This particular tour is designed for adults and teenagers 16+. We have family-specific tours that might better suit your needs.

inquiry_text: What is the average group size?
response_text: Our average group size is 8-12 people, with a maximum of 16 on our standard tours.

inquiry_text: Can I book additional nights before/after the tour?
response_text: Yes, we can arrange pre and post-tour accommodation at our partner hotels. Please request this during booking.

inquiry_text: Do you provide airport transfers?
response_text: Yes, complimentary airport transfers are included on the first and last day of the tour within specified time windows.

inquiry_text: Is travel insurance included?
response_text: Travel insurance is not included in the tour price. We strongly recommend purchasing comprehensive travel insurance.

inquiry_text: What currency should I bring?
response_text: Local currency is recommended for small purchases. Major credit cards are widely accepted in tourist areas.

inquiry_text: Are there laundry facilities available?
response_text: Most hotels offer laundry services for an additional fee. For longer stays, we schedule stops where laundry is possible.

inquiry_text: Can you accommodate my food allergy?
response_text: Yes, we can accommodate food allergies with advance notice. Please detail your specific allergies during booking.

inquiry_text: What type of transportation is used?
response_text: We use a combination of private minivans, public transport, and domestic flights depending on the itinerary.

inquiry_text: Do I need special vaccinations?
response_text: Vaccination requirements vary by destination. We recommend consulting with a travel medicine specialist before your trip.

inquiry_text: Is there a single supplement fee?
response_text: Yes, there is a single supplement fee of $450 if you prefer not to share accommodation with another traveler.

inquiry_text: What is the baggage allowance?
response_text: We recommend one medium suitcase/backpack (20kg max) and one daypack per person due to space limitations in vehicles.

inquiry_text: Are tips included in the price?
response_text: Tips are not included in the tour price. We provide tipping guidelines in our pre-departure information.

inquiry_text: Can I extend my stay at the same hotel?
response_text: Yes, subject to availability. We can help arrange this at our contracted rates if requested in advance.

inquiry_text: Do you offer private tours?
response_text: Yes, most of our itineraries can be arranged as private departures for an additional fee.

inquiry_text: What is the weather like during this period?
response_text: April-May is spring season with mild temperatures (15-25Â°C) and occasional rain showers.

inquiry_text: How physically demanding is this tour?
response_text: This tour is rated moderate with walking on uneven terrain for 3-4 hours per day and one day with a 6-hour hike.

inquiry_text: Are there any age restrictions?
response_text: This tour requires a minimum age of 14 years. There's no upper age limit, but a good level of fitness is needed.

inquiry_text: Is there free time built into the itinerary?
response_text: Yes, we include free time in each location for personal exploration or optional activities.

inquiry_text: What power adapters should I bring?
response_text: The destination uses Type C electrical outlets. A universal adapter is recommended for international travelers.

inquiry_text: Can I drink the tap water?
response_text: We recommend drinking bottled water, which will be readily available throughout the tour.

inquiry_text: Do you offer any photography-focused tours?
response_text: Yes, we have specialized photography tours led by professional photographers to several destinations.

inquiry_text: What's the dress code for included dinners?
response_text: Smart casual is appropriate for most included dinners. One farewell dinner at a upscale restaurant requires more formal attire.

inquiry_text: Can I charge my electronics during the trek?
response_text: Charging facilities are available at overnight accommodation, though may be limited in more remote teahouses.

inquiry_text: Do you provide a packing list?
response_text: Yes, a detailed packing list will be sent with your confirmation documents after booking.

inquiry_text: Can I book additional activities during the tour?
response_text: Yes, your tour guide can help arrange additional activities during free time, subject to availability.

inquiry_text: Is there a doctor on the tour?
response_text: No, but our guides are first-aid trained, and we operate in areas with access to medical facilities.

inquiry_text: What happens if I miss the welcome meeting?
response_text: Please inform us in advance. You'll need to make your own way to the first accommodation where you can meet the group.

inquiry_text: Can you accommodate my mobility issues?
response_text: This particular tour involves significant walking on uneven terrain. We have alternative tours designed for travelers with limited mobility.

inquiry_text: Are entrance fees included?
response_text: Yes, all entrance fees mentioned in the itinerary are included in the tour price.

inquiry_text: What's your policy on sustainable tourism?
response_text: We follow sustainable practices including carbon offsetting, plastic waste reduction, and supporting local communities.

inquiry_text: Do your guides speak English?
response_text: Yes, all our guides are fluent in English and the local language of the destination.

inquiry_text: How much spending money should I bring?
response_text: We recommend $25-40 per day for additional meals, drinks, souvenirs, and optional activities not included in the itinerary.

inquiry_text: Is there a dress code for religious sites?
response_text: Yes, modest dress covering shoulders and knees is required. Head coverings for women are necessary at some sites.

inquiry_text: Can I opt out of certain activities?
response_text: Yes, activities are optional, though no refund is provided for unused services.

inquiry_text: What's the level of comfort of accommodations?
response_text: This tour uses 3-4 star hotels with en-suite facilities in cities and comfortable guesthouses in rural areas.

inquiry_text: Do you offer any student discounts?
response_text: Yes, we offer a 5% discount for students with valid ID. Please mention this during booking.

inquiry_text: Are there any hidden costs?
response_text: No hidden costs. Optional activities, personal expenses, and items not mentioned in inclusions are extra.

inquiry_text: How far in advance should I book?
response_text: We recommend booking 3-6 months in advance for popular destinations, especially during high season.

inquiry_text: Can I get a private room?
response_text: Yes, private rooms are available for a single supplement fee, subject to availability.

inquiry_text: What happens in case of flight delays?
response_text: Please contact our emergency number. We'll arrange alternative transfers and adjust your itinerary as needed.

inquiry_text: Do you carbon offset your trips?
response_text: Yes, we carbon offset all of our trips through verified carbon offset programs included in the trip cost.

inquiry_text: Can I change my booking dates?
response_text: Date changes are possible subject to availability and may incur a fee if made less than 60 days before departure.
